attributes.action: Treat books with foul language on the cover, or easily accessible within, in the same category as adult magazines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: More and more are we having to see foul language on the covers of books. Recently, Waterstones has had "my shit life so far" in its windows on full display. Borders, in the past, has had Animals with Tourette's in the aisle to the counter, in reach of children. The latter book contains language totally inappropriate for access by children.
